publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1088# Colin Fox: Reasons to be Cheerful-That the Parliament congratulates 7:84 Theatre Company (Scotland) on its latest production "Reasons to be Cheerful" which is currently touring the country; believes that it is a good example of the company's radical origins, and supports 7:84 in its application to the Scottish Arts Council for funding beyond March 2005.

S2M-1088# Colin Fox: Reasons to be Cheerful-That the Parliament congratulates 7:84 Theatre Company (Scotland) on its latest production "Reasons to be Cheerful" which is currently touring the country; believes that it is a good example of the company's radical origins, and supports 7:84 in its application to the Scottish Arts Council for funding beyond March 2005.
S2M-1088# Reasons to be Cheerful (lodged on 23 March 2004) John Swinburne*
